DICE Firmware Compiled on 8 Oct 2009
Main Page | Modules | Alphabetical List | Data Structures | Data Fields | Related Pages

ConfigRomBuilder

Detailed Description

This module is used to build the device Configuration ROM.

 CRBElement is the node type for all nodes in the binary tree, which represents the ROM. More...

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct CRBElement_t CRBElement
 

CRBElement is the node type for all nodes in the binary tree, which represents the ROM.

The root element is a static singleton. Generally, the tree looks like:

root_element->pNext = 0 (always) | ->data.pList->immediate_element->pNext->dir_element->pNext->leaf_element->pNext->immediate_element-> etc... root directory entries | | | | ->data.pLeafData ->data.immVal | ->data.pList->element->pNext-> etc... sub directory entries | ->data.pList->element

typedef CRBElement* CRBHANDLE
 

tree node handle

HRESULT crbWalkTreeBFirst (  crbElementFunc  func,
void *  pData
) 
 

Bredth first tree walk, the root directory is not enumerated, it starts with the members of the Root.

The depth variable is always 0 for this walk.

HRESULT crbWalkTreeDFirst (  crbElementFunc  func,
void *  pData
) 
 

Depth first tree walk, the root directory is not enumerated, it starts with the members of the Root.

The depth variable indicates the depth of the object. Members of Root dir will have depth 0.

HRESULT crbCalculateRomSize (  uint32 *  pSize  ) 
 

Calculate the size needed for the ROM image in quadlets.

uint32 *  pRomQuadSize
